name: Minor League Baseball Chef 2018
description:
Known issues with web version:

  • Timer does not display correctly above 1 minute
  • May or may not play audio on Firefox, I'm getting different results on different computers. ¯\_(ツ)_/¯
  • Some mouse lag on Chrome on one of my computers, but it's fine on another. Who knows why
  • You can try using a trackpad if you want, but you're probably gonna have a bad time. Mouse is recommended

Please let me know if you encounter any other issues.

--------------------

Achieve your baseball dreams--by preparing food for minor league players!

Learn how baseball life isn't all it's cracked up to be (if you're not in the majors).

Made in a weekend for Ludum Dare 41 (Theme: Combine 2 Incompatible Genres). Baseball + cooking simulator.

Made with GameMaker Studio 1.4. Apologies if the Windows version angers your antivirus. It isn't a virus, I promise.

Controls

Click on an ingredient to select it, click and drag to spread it

Windows only:

Z to toggle window size (between 1280x720 and 960x540)

F to toggle fullscreen

ESC to quit

Credits

Almost everything by Dan Thompson, except:

Music by Cal Clarke

Thanks for checking out my game!
